summary: Episodic, spiritual and existentialistic look at the state the Russia is in in 2017, exactly one hundred years after the communist-led Russian Revolution. The future looks gloomy, since the world is on the brink of yet another world war.
cast: Louis Franck|Merab Ninidze|Viktoriya Korotkova|Chulpan Khamatova|Viktor Bugakov|Karim Pakachakov|Konstantin Zeliger|Anastasiya Melnikova|Piotr Gasowski|Filipp Dyachkov|Tania Fox|Marzena Hovhannisyan|Valentin Russu|Ramil Salakhutdinov|Sergey Siplivyy|Nikita Terentev|Dmitriy Vozdvizhenskiy
director: Director: Aleksey German Jr. (as Aleksey German)
title: Pod elektricheskimi oblakami
